price: እናንተ ሰዎች ሆይ! በምድር ካለው ነገር የተፈቀደ ጣፋጭ ሲኾን ብሉ፡፡ የሰይጣንን እርምጃዎች አትከታተሉ፡፡ እርሱ ለእናንተ ግልጽ ጠላት ነውና፡፡
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu kulū mimmā fī al-arḍi ḥalālan ṭayyiban walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
